plentry.pd: URL of the image. Supported image formats include JPEG, JPG, PNG, and GIF. Supports adding images from local absolute or relative paths. On Android, adding images from /assets/ is not supported.
Frame rate of the published video stream, range is [1, 30], default is 1.

URL of the image. Supported image formats include JPEG, JPG, PNG, and GIF. You can add images using either an absolute or relative local path. On Android, adding images from /assets/ is not supported.
Frame rate of the currently published video stream. Value range is [1, 30], default is 1.

Mirror mode:
VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_AUTO (0): The SDK determines whether to enable mirror mode. Disabled by default.
VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_ENABLED (1): Enable remote mirror.
VIDEO_MIRROR_MODE_DISABLED (2): Disable remote mirror.
